info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Berks County through 245 PM EDT... At 217 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fleetwood, or 9 miles northeast of Reading, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kutztown, Fleetwood, Laureldale, Topton and Lyons. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
